thumbnail.description: He crafts responsive applications where technologies meet creativity

about.description:
Hello, I’m Nishant!

I am a full-stack developer based in India, currently open for work. I specialize in creating responsive websites from scratch and transforming them into modern, user-friendly web experiences.

With over a year of experience in this field, I am continually striving to learn the latest technologies and frameworks. I am excited about the opportunity to join a great team as a full-time member.

project1.name: Grabit
project1.description: An online marketplace tailored for the Institute during the COVID-19 pandemic, designed to minimize physical interactions by enabling multi-photo ad postings, detailed product views, and integrated chat and support features.

project2.name: Wine Quality Prediction
project2.description: A predictive model for wine quality using Logistic Regression, based on a dataset from the UCI Machine Learning Repository. The model achieved an accuracy of up to 90%, providing reliable insights into wine quality.

project3.name: Hack4Earth
project3.description: A microblogging platform developed in just 7 days for the Hack for Earth Hackathon, allowing users to share ideas and initiatives related to our institution’s cleanliness drive. Achieved a top-three ranking in the competition.

project4.name: Real Estate Office
project4.description: A database management system designed and implemented for a real estate office, facilitating agents in efficiently managing and selling properties within a city.

project5.name: Portfolio
project5.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my work, skills, and achievements. It provides an overview of my professional background and serves as a platform to showcase my projects and accomplishments.

contact.description: I’m currently looking for full-time opportunities to join a great team. If you have any questions or opportunities, don’t hesitate to contact me.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

job1.title: SDE Intern
job1.description: Led the migration of the existing codebase to the Gainsight Horizon components, aligning with a new design system akin to Ant Design, showcasing adept adaptation and in-depth understanding of complex codebases. Continuously engaged in daily tasks of creating new features, updating existing features, and improving performance by reducing API response time to meet business requirements, while adhering to best practices. Actively collaborating with the security team to address and resolve all security-related issues for our team’s codebase, ensuring prompt fixes for any identified vulnerabilities.
